title: 318: Unreleased FIRST Episode EVER! (aka Potty Mouth Podcast)
itunes:title: 318: Unreleased FIRST Episode EVER! (aka Potty Mouth Podcast)
description:
It’s finally that time, Broads! Bekah and Jess are releasing the FIRST “episode” of the podcast they ever recorded 3 years ago - a time when the name “Chatty Broads” did not exist, Bekah was still pregnant with Ruth, and Jess had never done anything like this before! Enjoy The Broads fumble their way through discovering how this whole thing works and getting to know each other for practically the first time! Thank you #broadsquad for the years of support - through the good times and the bad, through the pregnancies and the preschool graduations, through the 1 million episodes of the Bachelor/ette and the vulnerable, tough conversations. We love you. Enjoy the hot mess!

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

***DAILY HARVEST: Go to DAILYHARVEST.COM/CHATTY to get up to $40 off your first box! 

***MODERN FERTILITY: Get $20 off the test when you go to MODERNFERTILITY.COM/CHATTY 

***FIRSTLEAF WINE CLUB: Get 6 bottles of wine for $29.95 and free shipping at TRYFIRSTLEAF.COM/CHATTY

***ARTICLE: Get $50 off your first purchase of $100 or more at ARTICLE.COM/CHATTY

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
